ch.neliuk.tools.timeevo.model

Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.neliuk.tools.timeevo.model.Clock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class Clock
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Clock is the class running the core of the clock

    Update every second and send the new time to all observers

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    NeliuK

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Calendar cal
      Instance of a calendar to retrieve the time
      private java.lang.String hour
      String to format the time, returned by the class every update
      private java.util.ArrayList<Observer> listObserver
      Observers collection.

      void delObservers()
      Removes all the observers from the list
      void run()
      Main method of this class.
      void updateObservers()
      Tells all observers the observable object has been modified by calling the update(hour) method with the new time for each of them.
